name: Glooplet
description: Barely sentient but eager to play (and eat).

drop.name: Bronze Ore
drop.description: Dull copper-brown chunks with streaks of gold, exuding a faint metallic tang.

drop.name: Iron Ore
drop.description: Jagged, dark gray rocks with a subtle sheen of silver under the light.

drop.name: String
drop.description: Plain, twisted Fiber with a coarse, natural texture.

drop.name: Wool
drop.description: Soft, fluffy bundles in pale cream tones, warm to the touch.

drop.name: Wood
drop.description: Simple, weathered planks of timber with rough bark edges.

drop.name: Sticky Sword
drop.description: A crude blade made from sticky sap-covered wood, barely holding its shape. A humble beginning for any adventurer.

drop.name: Slime Bronze Sword
drop.description: A sturdy sword gleaming with goo, crafted by novice slime smiths. Its bronze edge reflects the maker's care.

drop.name: Blight Helm
drop.description: A helm infused with shadowed energy, radiating an aura of corruption and decay.

drop.name: Void Helm
drop.description: A sleek and ethereal helm crafted from voidium, granting enhanced agility and perception.

drop.name: Blight Plate
drop.description: A corrupted armor forged from shadowed materials, emanating an aura of decay.

drop.name: Void Plate
drop.description: A sleek armor made of voidium, designed for agility and enhanced with ethereal energy.

drop.name: Sticky Shield
drop.description: A basic shield of slimewood, perfect for beginners.

drop.name: Slime Bronze Shield
drop.description: Reinforced with slime-bronze, offering reliable protection.

drop.name: Sticky Mantle
drop.description: A slimy, flexible mantle offering basic protection.

drop.name: Bronze Warden Cape
drop.description: Bronze-threaded and durable, guarding its wearer.
